mapper.select: SELECT cno,rno,type,id,name,sex,msg,TO_CHAR(regdate,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as dbday FROM all_comment WHERE rno=#{rno} AND type=#{type} ORDER BY cno DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM all_comment WHERE rno=#{rno} AND type=#{type}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO all_comment(cno,rno,type,id,name,sex,msg,group_id) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(cno)+1,1) FROM all_comment), #{rno},#{type},#{id},#{name},#{sex}, #{msg},(SELECT NVL(MAX(group_id)+1,1) FROM all_comment))
